entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @NCDCgov @Fmohnigeria @FMICNigeria @nmanigeria @DrEOEhanire @LSMOH @FCTAbujaPHEOC @ProfAkinAbayomi @AfricaCDC @WHONigeria @nanonlineng I will like to suggest that we add a Tab to indicate ACTIVE CASES which by this report will be 164. This would help to bring relief n reduce the public fear on COVID-19 as not being a death sentence as they see reduction in d figures n increase in recovery rates. Tnx 4 d gud job
